src:
Gempa M 3,1 Terjadi di Pacitan
07 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Matius Alfons
Jakarta - Gempa bermagnitudo 3,1 mengguncang Pacitan, Jawa Timur. Pusat gempa terjadi di darat.
Dilihat dari situs resmi BMKG, Kamis (7/11/2019), gempa tersebut terjadi pada pukul 21.27 WIB. Pusat gempa berada di tenggara Pacitan.
"Pusat gempa berada di darat 4 km Tenggara Pacitan," tulis BMKG.
Gempa terjadi di kedalaman 11 km. Titik koordinat gempa tercatat di 8,23 Lintang Selatan (LS) dan 111,13 Bujur Timur (BT).
Gempa dirasakan dengan skala MMI III, yang artinya dirasakan oleh beberapa orang dan benda-benda ringan menggantung bergoyang. Sampai sejauh ini belum ada info terkait ada atau tidaknya kerusakan akibat gempa tersebut.

(maa/idn)
text:
3.1 M earthquake occurred in Pacitan
Nov 7 2019, 22:20 by Matthew Alfons
Jakarta - 3.1 magnitude earthquake shook Pacitan, East Java. The epicenter happened on land.
Judging from the official website of BMKG, Thursday (11/07/2019), the earthquake occurred at 21.27 WIB. The epicenter was southeast of Pacitan.
"The epicenter was on land 4 km southeast of Pacitan," BMKG wrote.
The earthquake occurred at a depth of 11 km. The coordinates of the earthquake were recorded at 8.23 South Latitude (LS) and 111.13 East Longitude (BT).
The earthquake was felt on an MMI III scale, which means it was felt by some people and light objects hanging swaying. So far there has been no information regarding whether or not there was damage caused by the earthquake.

(maa / idn)
